actions.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 285 (Roll no. 240).

description: Amendment sought to reduce Navy Shipbuilding and Conversion procurement by $404 million.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 14 in the Congressional Record of June 12, 1996 to reduce the appropriation for Nave shipbuilding by $404 million. The purpose of the amendment is to eliminate funding for additional attack submarines.
